description: HelmRelease is the Schema for the helm release

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: HelmReleaseSpec defines the spec of HelmRelease

atomic.description: Atomic, for install case, if true, will uninstall failed release.

chart.description: Chart is the name of a Helm Chart in the Repository.

chartPullSecret.description: ChartPullSecret is the name of the secret that contains the auth information for the chart repository.

createNamespace.description: CreateNamespace create namespace when install helm release

disableHooks.description: DisableHooks disables hook processing if set to true.

force.description:
Force will, if set to `true`, ignore certain warnings and perform the upgrade anyway.
This should be used with caution.

overrides.description: Overrides specifies the override values for this release.

releaseName.description:
ReleaseName specifies the desired release name in child cluster.
If nil, the default release name will be in the format of "{Description Name}-{HelmChart Namespace}-{HelmChart Name}"

replace.description:
Replace will re-use the given name, only if that name is a deleted release that remains in the history.
This is unsafe in production.

replaceCRDs.description: ReplaceCRDs replace all crds in chart and sub charts before upgrade and install, not working when SkipCRDs true

repo.description:
a Helm Repository to be used.
OCI-based registries are also supported.
For example, https://charts.bitnami.com/bitnami or oci://localhost:5000/helm-charts

skipCRDs.description: SkipCRDs skips installing CRDs when install flag is enabled during upgrade

targetNamespace.description: TargetNamespace specifies the namespace to install the chart

timeoutSeconds.description: TimeoutSeconds is the timeout of the chart to be install/upgrade/rollback/uninstall

upgradeAtomic.description: UpgradeAtomic, for upgrade case, if true, will roll back failed release.

version.description:
ChartVersion is the version of the chart to be deployed.
It will be defaulted with current latest version if empty.

wait.description: Wait determines whether the wait operation should be performed after helm install, upgrade or uninstall is requested.

waitForJob.description: WaitForJobs determines whether the wait operation for the Jobs should be performed after the upgrade is requested.

status.description: HelmReleaseStatus defines the observed state of HelmRelease

description.description: Description is human-friendly "log entry" about this release.

firstDeployed.description: FirstDeployed is when the release was first deployed.

lastDeployed.description: LastDeployed is when the release was last deployed.

notes.description: Contains the rendered templates/NOTES.txt if available

phase.description: Phase is the current state of the release

version.description: Version is an int which represents the revision of the release.
